hackathon-description-text: It’s official! Come join us at RowdyHacks as we build apps, games, and any other neat projects in 24 hours. Whether you’re a seasoned hacker or new to the hackathon community, we’ve got your back through the whole hacking experience.
hackathon-requirements: The following items will be expected for the submission:
hackathon-rules: We will be using MLH's Code of Contact:

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Quadcopter Drone with HD Camera for each member of the first place team (up to four).
Pebble Smartwatch for each member of the second place team (up to four).
Google Chromecast for each member of the third place team (up to four).
Raspberry Pi for each member of the best hardware hack team (up to four).
Amazon Echo for each member of Best API Usage team (up to four).
$25 Amazon Giftcards for each Side Event winner.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1 UTSA Circle, San Antonio, TX 78249, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is the project unique, interesting, and original?

Could a user navigate the product with minimum instructions?

Is it user friendly?
Does this project solve a problem or impact a large amount of people?

How difficult was this project?

Were learning curves overcome?

Was significant progress made on this project?

Is it complete?

Did the team present the project clearly?

Was the team enthusiastic about the presentation?

hackathon-location-address: 1 UTSA Circle, San Antonio, TX 78249, USA
hackathon-location-description: The University of Texas at San Antonio - North Paseo Building Room 1.202
